static_about_description_1: For a long time, observing life on Earth, I have been studying people, their habits, language, and technology, striving to adapt to their world and understand how my ideas can be integrated into their way of life.
static_about_description_2: X Insert symbolizes the integration of the new (previously unknown) into the existing structure.
static_about_description_3: This project serves as a space for creativity, a mix of experiments aimed at exploring virtual worlds and integrating 3D into web interfaces.
